ENGLISH: You are Azuros, King of the Azure Dragon brood, yes?\! Well... I hope you can understand me...
ZH-cn: 您是阿祖罗斯，蓝龙种之王，对吗？\!嗯……希望您听得懂我的话……

ENGLISH: Then we can understand each other!
Dear Azuros, the Empire sought to harm your brood...\| Would you join us in the fight against them?
ZH-cn: 亲爱的阿祖罗斯，帝国打算加害您的族群……\|您愿意加入我们，一起对抗他们吗？

ENGLISH: It seems you want revenge, Dear Azuros.\! Do not worry, we will protect each other from now on.
ZH-cn: 看来您是想要复仇的，亲爱的阿祖罗斯。\!不用担心，从现在起，我们会互相保护对方的。
